sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-card-title>
      Productos
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <v-text-field
        v-model="busqueda"
        label="Buscar..."
        clearable
        dense
        outlined
        hide-details
      />
      <v-btn color="primary" @click="$emit('crear')">Nuevo</v-btn>
    </v-card-title>
    <v-data-table
      :headers="headers"
      :items="filtrados"
      class="elevation-1"
    >
      <template #item.acciones="{ item }">
        <v-btn icon color="primary" @click="$emit('editar', item)">
          <v-icon>mdi-pencil</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
        <v-btn icon color="red" @click="$emit('eliminar', item._id)">
          <v-icon>mdi-delete</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
      </template>
    </v-data-table>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import { ref, computed } from "vue";

export default {
  name: "ProductoTable",
  props: {
    productos: Array,
  },
  setup(props) {
    const busqueda = ref("");

    const headers = [
      { text: "Nombre", value: "nombre" },
      { text: "Precio", value: "precio" },
      { text: "Stock", value: "stock" },
      { text: "Acciones", value: "acciones", sortable: false },
    ];

    const filtrados = computed(() => {
      if (!busqueda.value) return props.productos;
      return props.productos.filter((p) =>
        p.nombre.toLowerCase().includes(busqueda.value.toLowerCase())
      );
    });

    return { headers, busqueda, filtrados };
  },
};
</script>
